com.github.rahulrvp.android_utils

Class ValidationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rahulrvp.android_utils.ValidationUtils

  • public class ValidationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps commonly used form validation methods.

      • isEmail

        public static boolean isEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Checks if the email is valid.
        Parameters:
        email - email address to be validated.
        Returns:
        true if valid, false otherwise

      • isGlobalPhoneNumber

        public static boolean isGlobalPhoneNumber(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Checks if the passed in phone number is valid according to global standards.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number to be validated.
        Returns:
        true if valid, false otherwise

      • isIndianPhoneNumber

        public static boolean isIndianPhoneNumber(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Checks if the phone number is a valid indian phone number.

        Note: This is a very basic validation I added. Any improvements are welcomed. Please see the implementation for more details.

        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number to be validated.
        Returns:
        true if valid, false otherwise

      • addPhoneNumberValidator

        public static void addPhoneNumberValidator(android.widget.EditText editText)
        This method helps to remove all the invalid characters added in the phone number field once the edit text loses it's focus.

        Note: This action will be overridden if the developer adds another focus change listener after calling this method.

        Parameters:
        editText - The EditText on which we need to attach the listener.
